rows.label: qst400304_msg0001
rows.name:
I need you to defeat the Juppen
Krabble lurking on Lascham Island.

rows.label: qst400304_msg0002
rows.name:
You can see Lascham Island on the left
as you head out of the town entrance.

rows.label: qst400304_msg0003
rows.name:
You can take the long route around the
plains, or if you're feeling adventurous,
there's a shortcut across the branches.

rows.label: qst400304_msg0102
rows.name:
Took out that Juppen Krabble,
did you? I knew I made the right call
asking you guys.

rows.label: qst400304_msg0103
rows.name:
Here's the Perfect Range Sensor,
as promised.

rows.label: qst400304_msg0104
rows.name:
We've had it lying around since my
grandpa's generation, so it's a bit
dusty, but it should work just fine.
